nodes.text: Sturdimoss was a moss that was used as a living carpet for the large transparisteel atrium known as the Morning Court, which was located in the New Jedi Temple on the Core World of Coruscant. As the secret Sith Lord Jacen Solo left the Morning Court to join the Galactic Alliance's Fourth Fleet, the heels of his boots dug into the sturdimoss floor.
Sturdimoss appeared in the 2007 novel Legacy of the Force: Inferno, written by Troy Denning.
